Uses of Enum Class
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.Identity

Packages that use Identity
Package
Description
fr.sos.witchhunt.model
This package contains all interfaces and classes that are used at plural levels of the MVC-architecture's model.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards
Contains all components defining the different types of cards that are used in this game with their effects, as well as structures for easing their manipulation.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
This package contains all elements defining the players, their possible actions within the game and the notifications they can send towards the view level of the MVC architecture.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
This package's purpose is to propose an all-in-one set of tools used to define CPU-controlled players' artificial intelligences,
